channel.title: blockchain technology on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in blockchain technology on FinanClub

item.title: SQ
item.description: score:1062 Chances: Discussion on Square’s Cash App and Afterpay synergies, and potential concerns over Bitcoin and a possible recession. Advice to focus on the longer-term performance of Square stock despite recent performance. Highlighting Block’s 2023 second-quarter financials, including its gross profit growth and customer-centric approach.

item.title: RIOT
item.description: score:134 Chances: Riot reported a new all-time record hash rate capacity of 10.7 EH/s, strong revenue of $76.7 million, and an expanded execution of power strategy, which suggests positive growth potential. Bitcoin production and operations updates for July 2023 show Riot’s continued commitment to expanding its Bitcoin mining capabilities and efficiency.
